problem:
You are a great scientist. Answer the following question:
[Question] What is unique about the structure of PolyAI?
[Answer]
answer: PolyAI has a geometric structure that resembles the letters "AI", and it consists of 1-(2,5-dimethylhex-3-yn-1-yl)-2-methylcycloprop-1-ene as its repeating unit.
pred:
PolyAI is unique in the sense that it is the only polymer that has a one-dimensional (1D) structure. All other polymers have a two-dimensional (2D) structure, which is why they are commonly called "sheets'. In contrast, the 1D structure of PolyAI creates a unique bulge in the middle of the polymer. This bulge are called "sectors" in the literature.
